snippet: Too much debate has focused on textbook remedies to the nation’s economic troubles, and not enough on how Americans have lost faith in political solutions to problems.
abstract: Tyler Cowen Economic View column contends too much debate has focused on textbook remedies to the nation’s economic troubles, and not enough on Americans' loss of trust and faith in political solutions to problems; holds it is not an easy problem to fix, but the place to start is by recognizing it.
lead_paragraph: Too much debate has focused on textbook remedies to the nation’s economic troubles, and not enough on how Americans have lost faith in political solutions to problems.
